name: Gloves of Mischief
data: It increases the users dexterity slightly.
It decreases the users wisdom unnoticably.
It decreases the users intelligence unnoticably.
It has non-existent armour class for its type (non-existent in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration pitifully.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'steal'.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It affects the user's skill knowledge.
